name: skill-link
short_effect: Extends two-to-five-hit moves and triple kick to their full length every time.

flavor_text.sun_moon: Maximizes the number of times multi-strike moves hit.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Maximizes the number of times multi-strike moves hit.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Maximizes the number of times multistrike moves hit.
